articles.title: Alexander Mogilny selected to Hockey Hall of Fame | Buffalo Sabres - NHL.com
articles.summary: Alexander Mogilny selected to Hockey Hall of Fame The pioneering winger holds the Sabres' single-season goals record. Alexander Mogilny, whose defection from the Soviet Union and subsequent record-setting tenure with the Buffalo Sabres made him a trailblazer for Russian players in the NHL, has been selected to the Hockey Hall of Fame as a member of its Class of 2025.
